quote: I'll always want him. Until every sun goes dark in every sky, until I am nothing more than long-forgotten cosmic dust, I will want him. And even then I suspect my particles will long for his.
quote_letters: ILL ALWAYS WANT HIM UNTIL EVERY SUN GOES DARK IN EVERY SKY UNTIL I AM NOTHING MORE THAN LONG-FORGOTTEN COSMIC DUST I WILL WANT HIM AND EVEN THEN I SUSPECT MY PARTICLES WILL LONG FOR HIS
